about_the_game:
Sentimental K is a 3D roguelike action game.



Sentimental K blends the dynamic, intuitive gameplay of 3D action games with the unpredictable and ever-changing nature of roguelikes.

Players must defeat enemies and progress towards their goal using 『Weapons, Skills, and Artifacts』 obtained from various situations. If players die during their journey, they lose all their rewards and must restart from the beginning.

With 5 weapons, 78 skills, 132 artifacts, 13 bosses, and randomly generated dungeon layouts, each playthrough is unique. You'll need to find your own optimal configurations to make it all the way to the end!

Features


  • Dynamic Action and 3D Action Camera
    With our extensive experience in action game development, we've crafted Sentimental K with tight controls and dynamic 3D action that remains visceral and rhythmic. The game primarily uses a top-down view, but the camera dynamically adjusts for an optimal player experience.


  • Unique Boss Concepts
    Sentimental K's bosses are designed around specific emotions. Explore and conquer these unique challenges!


  • Deep, Synergistic Strategies
    Players must carefully consider how to effectively combine the 『Weapons, Skills, and Artifacts』 they acquire. Create your own synergy builds to conquer the dungeons!


  • Randomness
    Weapons, skills, artifacts, bosses, dungeon layouts, and other elements are randomly generated, ensuring a fresh experience every time you play.


  • Permadeath
    Unfortunately, if you're killed by a monster, you must start over from the beginning with only your basic weapon. Your character's stats do not permanently improve; instead, your growth as a player and your immersive experience drive progress.

highlighted.name: Combat Basics - Introduction to Dual pistols

Sentimental K blends the dynamic, intuitive gameplay of 3D action games with the unpredictable and ever-changing nature of roguelikes.

With 5 weapons, 78 skills, 132 artifacts, 13 bosses, and randomly generated dungeon layouts, each playthrough is unique. You'll need to find your own optimal configurations to make it all the way to the end!

    With our extensive experience in action game development, we've crafted Sentimental K with tight controls and dynamic 3D action that remains visceral and rhythmic. The game primarily uses a top-down view, but the camera dynamically adjusts for an optimal player experience.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: intel i3+
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

name: Sentimental K

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7+
  • Processor: intel i3+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7+
  • Processor: intel i5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews:
“Sentimental K is without a doubt a hidden gem, and I guess that it has been overlooked by some people mainly due to its looks, as the game certainly doesn’t show its best in screenshots or videos, you actually have to play it to get it.”
Davide Roriz at Bonus Stage

“If you are a roguelike fan, I would definitely say this is one that you may want to pick up or wishlist and watch the development go along.”
Indie Direct
short_description: 'Sentimental K' is a 3D roguelike action game. Weapons, skills, artifacts, bosses, dungeon layouts are randomly generated each time you play. Make strategic choices to create powerful synergies and enjoy the unexpected and challenging play!
supported_languages: English, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
